With this resolution I traversed <lb n="c57-0100__main__9"/>the north<add place="intralinear">ern</add> highlands and fixed on one of the <lb n="c57-0100__main__10"/>Orkney Islands for the scene of my labours. <lb n="c57-0100__main__11"/><del rend="strikethrough">I was</del> It was a place fitted for such <add place="sublinear"><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></add><add place="superlinear">a</add> work; <lb n="c57-0100__main__12"/>being hardly more than a rock whose high <lb n="c57-0100__main__13"/>sides were continually beaten upon by the <lb n="c57-0100__main__14"/>waves– The soil was barren hardly affording <lb n="c57-0100__main__15"/>pasture for a few miserable cows & oat <lb n="c57-0100__main__16"/>meal for its <del rend="strikethrough">few</del> inhabitants which consis<lb n="c57-0100__main__17"/>ted of five person<add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear">s</add>, Whose gaunt & scraggy <lb n="c57-0100__main__18"/>limbs gave token<add place="intralinear">s</add> of their sorry fare. <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0100.02"/>Fresh <lb n="c57-0100__main__19"/>water.<anchor xml:id="c57-0100.02"/> Vegetables & bread, when they indulged <lb n="c57-0100__main__20"/>in such luxuries, & even fresh water was <lb n="c57-0100__main__21"/>to be procured from the main land which <lb n="c57-0100__main__22"/>was about five miles distant. On the <lb n="c57-0100__main__23"/>whole island there were but three mise<lb n="c57-0100__main__24"/>rable huts & one of these was vacant <lb n="c57-0100__main__25"/>when I arrived.
